description:
It`s up to Connor, the rest of the Botties, and, surprisingly, Dr. K to restore Cubix and Maximix, ward off the zombot army, prevent all of Bubble Town`s robots from Kilobot`s evil brainwashing, and beat him once and for all!
Source: bcdb.com

titles.title: Combock, Kimi wa Eien no Tomodachi!
コンボック, 君は永遠の友だち!
